alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Yazoo, central Issaquena, southern Sharkey and central Madison Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Way to near Onward. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Way and Vaughan around 815 PM CDT. Sharon around 820 PM CDT. Phoenix around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Satartia, Cary and Bentonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and west central Mississippi.
